official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Credit Union Act (12 U.S.C. 1751 et seq.) to correct the tax status of the National Credit Union Central Liquidity Facility.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Credit Union Act to exempt the National Credit Union Administration's Central Liquidity Facility from Federal, State, and local taxation, including notes and other obligations issued on behalf of the Central Liquidity Facility.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Credit Union Act (12 U.S.C. 1751 et seq.) to correct the tax status of the National Credit Union Central Liquidity Facility.
